title: Veggie Box
description: Opened Fall of 2014 is a 100% vegetarian/vegan self-service restaurant offering a moderate range of dishes. Daily menu varies and changes on a weekly basis. All vegetarian options can be made vegan. Located on a small side street close to one of the two main churches in the city. Offers exhibitions of local artists' works as well as cooking events. Furnishing is simple and cozy.
